parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The content of the template. The content must be in the JSON or YAML format, and its maximum size is 64 KB.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag keys and values. The number of key-value pairs ranges from 1 to 20.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the template. The name can be up to 200 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). The name cannot start with ALIYUN, ACS, ALIBABA, or ALICLOUD.

parameters.name: VersionName
parameters.description: The name of the template version.
